ComicInfo.Summary:
Madballs Meet Weirdbeard the Pirate: The Madballs are captured by Captain Weirdbeard and his pirate crew.
Dr. Frankenbeans Returns!: Dr. Frankenbeans enlists the help of Miss Tic the Mystic, who can hypnotize the Madballs and bring them under the Doctor's control.

ComicInfo.Title: Madballs Meet Weirdbeard the Pirate; Dr. Frankenbeans Returns!
